kpi.name: msc_409b

kpi_info.title: Call setup service mean time (unsuccessful cases)
kpi_info.use: This KPI tells Call Setup Service Mean Time in unsuccessful cases according to 3GPP TS52.402 at MSS level. In addition to 2G BSCs, 3G RNCs are included to this setup time. Setup time is counted from SETUP request to RAB ASSIGNMENT RESPONSE.

kpi.kpi_alias: Call setup service mean time (unsuccessful cases)
